title: 1985년 Summers 사건
summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Summers. 판결일: 1985-04-30. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Missouri v. Michael L. SUMMERS
**판결일**: 1985-04-30
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

**판사**: Manford, Somer, Turnage, Ville

## 변호인

James W. Fletcher, Public Defender, David S. Durbin, Asst. Public Defender, Kansas City, for appellant., William L. Webster, Atty. Gen., Leah A. Murry, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.

## 인용

- 693 S.W.2d 168

## 판결문 요약


ORDER
PER CURIAM:
This is a direct appeal from a jury conviction for armed robbery, first degree, in violation of § 569.020, RSMo 1978 and armed criminal action, in violation of § 571.-015.1, RSMo 1978.
Judgment affirmed. Rule 30.25(b).
...
